name: Naval Campaigns 2: The Battle of Tsushima
name_original: Naval Campaigns 2: The Battle of Tsushima
description:
Naval Campaigns 2: The Battle of Tsushima is a strategy game developed by HPS Simulations. It was originally released in 2003. It was published by HPS Simulations.
Naval Campaigns 2: The Battle of Tsushima is available on PC.
